attributes.action: Stop Theresa May from bringing her Brexit deal to a vote any more times.
attributes.additional_details: Motions which are substantively the similar cannot be brought to the House to be voted on more than once according to Erskine May. The speaker must have the full backing of the House is disallowing any further votes on May's botched deal.
attributes.background: Theresa May's failed and bodged Brexit deal has been voted down twice by enormous margins, making it simultaneously the 4th least and least successful motion ever put by a Government. She must not be allowed to blackmail MP's into voting for it only because the alternative is worse.
